name: EternalFlow
description: EternalFlow token aims to advance the next generation of reward tokens by offering larger reflections at 15%, greater token burns, more locked liquidity, and developing the ability to choose your own rewards in the future. Our unique Reflection Swap tool will bring the option for holders to select different reflections on demand. Subsequent utilities will include a Metaverse game with a focus of utilizing NFT's throughout game play. EternalFlow token utilizes a decentralized blockchain architecture which increases security and auditability, our token is built on top of the Binance Smart Chain.
